name: War Battle Simulator 3D
description:
Lead a legion of medieval warriors! New epic war game will turn heads of all strategy lovers. Command an accurate clash of army of warriors on frontline of medieval battlefield - let your legion fight. Show who domintes the frontline of war. Your army, your strategy, your victory!   

Features of War Battle Simulator: 

- Accurate strategy 
- Spectacular epic clash of warriors 
- Multiple units
 - Army management 
- Medieval battlefield 
- Cunning AI  

Mind over army! Command a frontline legion of warriors, staying away from the battlefield. That’s accurate for medieval war. Use strategy - place your warriors against enemy legion on battlefield and let the epic clash begin. Last man on the battlefield wins - that’s accurate for medieval war, warriors of each army are merciless. Whose legion will rule the frontline?  

War needs money. Hire all kinds of warriors, form your army wisely. Each clash gives resources for warriors upgrade. Medieval army command takes strategy. Plan a clash before entering battlefield, and your legion will be unstoppable. Magic and machines are accurate for epic medieval war, buy it for your army. Preparation will secure your victory on battlefield. Unite warriors of world in one epic legion!  

Radio is’t accurate for medieval. Warriors will fight on the frontline themselves, just form them up. Use strategy placing warriors on the frontline. Battlefield is limited as your army. Victory in a clash is decided before clash itself, that’s accurate for medieval war too. Epic clash unfolds according to your strategy, prepare your army well.  

War is epic! Command your legion to the frontline and dominate the battlefield!  Rally your army for an epic medieval war in War Battle Simulator!
